description:
[Webcamoid](https://webcamoid.github.io/) is a full featured and
multiplatform webcam suite.

[![](https://webcamoid.github.io/theme/images/screenshots/Main.webp)](https://webcamoid.github.io/)

## Features

- Cross-platform (GNU/Linux, Mac, Windows)
- Take pictures and record videos with the webcam.
- Manages multiple webcams.
- Written in C++ and Qt.
- Custom controls for each webcam.
- Add funny effects to the webcam.
- 60+ effects available.
- Translated to many languages.
- Use custom network and local files as capture devices.
- Capture from desktop.
- Many recording formats.
- Virtual webcam support for feeding other programs.
summary: Webcamoid is a full featured and multiplatform webcam suite.
author: Gonzalo Exequiel Pedone
